message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
Let's meet in the middle, Alice!
You proposed 50-50 last round, but I think I deserve a bit more now. Your turn!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but not that big, Alice!
You offered 70-30, but I think I deserve more now. I'm willing to take a risk to get a better deal.
I'm getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm willing to give you a small share, but I'm not going to let you get the better deal.
I'm running out of options, Alice. I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going to give up completely!
